column3: Violations of MAX_INV_SZ get you DOSflagged.  So it should get some "P2P node rule" flag, perhaps?  MAX_MONEY is an implicit protocol rule. Kinda obvious though.  ACK in any case.\n
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/9d6633ac0de9d2a24333525cffdf0b23164ecad3 for binaries and test log.\n
